name: homer
tagline: A simple static homepage for organizing links and basic widgets
description: Homer is a simple static homepage for organizing links and small informational widgets. Configuration is done via a YAML file and the resulting single page site can be hosted on any web server, ideal for lightweight dashboards.

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Generate a fast, static homepage that can be hosted anywhere

features.title: No Backend Required
features.description: Pure HTML/CSS/JS with no server-side processing needed

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Built-in search to quickly find services across all categories

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Navigate your dashboard efficiently with keyboard shortcuts

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: Works without internet connection once loaded

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Extremely lightweight with fast load times on any device
